price: Basi akawatokea watu wake kutoka mihirabuni. Akawaashiria: Msabihini Mwenyezi Mungu asubuhi na jioni.
arabic: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابِ فَأَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَن سَبِّحُواْ بُكۡرَةٗ وَعَشِيّٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fakharaja ʿalā qawmihi mina al-miḥ'rābi fa-awḥā ilayhim an sabbiḥū buk'ratan waʿashiyyan
